archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1507
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want to keep track of customer selections during the purchase journey including items that have been removed, so that I can notify the customer of any special offers that maybe of interest at a later stage.

properties.value: REP: How the required data should be provided on BSS side ? available for user on system screens? database level ? particular report/export ? (if Yes - what format is required/expected ?)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
